topic.title: HPE Helion Development Platform 2.0: Code Engine Operations Guide

abstract.shortdesc: Documentation to help operate Helion Code Engine.

section.p:
Please find the following documentation below to help you install and operate Helion Code Engine:
HCE Walk-through video: http://bit.ly/HelionCodeEngine
User Documentation: http://dev.hpcloud.com/hdp/reference/2.0/resource/continuous/engine_walkthrough
Install Documentation: http://dev.hpcloud.com/hdp/reference/2.0/install/install_engine
HPE Helion Development Platform upgrade documentation (for use when upgrading HPE Helion OpenStack from version 2.0 to version 2.1)
